item.description:
Well Im in the mood of having some Chineeze Food Tuesday evening and am inviting you to join me...

Of course you can go to the Hartford Japanize food place meetup..sounds good also, i cant go there though...but you know what i say about the seating arrangements, background noise, and difficult conversation..not to mention the "wild bill" hickup, at the end on who got what and the butt that dont put in their fair share or none at all....LOL....

Some im gonna make, the white rice, (that real hard to make), my own version of General Toe's shrimp, yes shrimp..not chicken, tastes better ..you can still make/get the General Toe's chicken..its good too...
Some we gonna get from the Chineeze food place right down the street..I got the menue on the table...
Pork Lomaine modifyed with the hot and spicy stuff is real good...well pick out what you like depending on your flaviour prefference and make it semi-buffet type sort of... REMEMBER-----WE DONT NEED THAT MUCH...we always have too much..but its sure good...LOL

Sound good?..good i thought so...the crunchy rice, the spicy to reguler flaviours are in your mind right now...craving for some good satisfying food, wine and conversation, Couldnt be better on a S~C~A~R~Y Season Rainy night.....

Oh of course, Some we can just substitute with something american....like the wine..etc...LOL..

Getting to AL's Shack:
321 Silas Deane Highway in Wethersfield..(the map link above is accurate enough) be careful of using Mapquest directions...read what i wrote first and compare...
its a business section but i have one of the last 12 or so residential houses on the street..(the 5th or 6th one down on the right or west side) ...
From hartford area take 84 east to 91 south...take exit #28 (same exit number for either 91 north or 91 south)..its the rte 5/15 exit to Wethersfield..from there take the next exit #85 on to (rte 99 south= Silas Deane Hwy) , take right off exit..you cant turn left anyway here..go strait (south)on Silas Deane hwy ..Landmarks=pass Murcury Oil Gas Satation on right, Price Right store on left and ...further a police station and Drunkin donuts...2 streets on right cumberland st then oxford st....now..on the left is a bunch of businesses..the medium bright medium-blue house is a hair dresser shop..im directly across from it in a small off white little ranch...
On the mail box on the side of the house the #321 is in orange/red...
I will put 2 traffic cones on the end of the driveway on the posts...and the glow in the dark SNOWMAN somewhere visible...
they will stick out im sure......

Pull way into the back yard...
Im parked at the house next door...
if my yard is full, then park there but leave the left side garage door accessable for my sister..

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Chineeze Theme Dinner at AL's Shack
